EmailTemplate.name: RE: $100 Amazon Gift Card for Turbonomic Introduction (1494245002.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: $100 Amazon Gift Card for Turbonomic Introduction (1494245002.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean DocumentEmail false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Joe, I wanted to follow up one last time to see if there is any interest in reviewing Turbonomic this week or next for the DC Water environment. I was hoping that we could set up an initial discussion to discuss DC Water’s environment and then see if Turbonomic is something that could be beneficial for you and the team. If that is not the case, I am happy to respect your time and walk away but just wanted to have that initial conversation. Please let me know if you have any time over the next couple of weeks and I would happy to arrange. Best regards, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Tuesday, May 2, 2017 7:33 AM To: 'joe.edwards@dcwater.com' <joe.edwards@dcwater.com> Subject: RE: $100 Amazon Gift Card for Turbonomic Introduction Joe, I wanted to provide you with some more info about how Turbonomic can help with optimization around hybrid cloud environments. Typically, organizations looking into a hybrid cloud infrastructure face three very difficult questions: · Which workloads should be burst to the public cloud?· When should we burst them?· When should we bring them back and where should we place them? Turbonomic’s economic abstraction answers all these questions and makes performance-cost driven placement sizing and auto-scaling decisions across all clouds. With Turbonomic you are enabled to extend your private cloud management approach to: · Burst workload into the cloud when demand increases and cannot be met with local resources· Maintain control on workload performance and resource utilization to decide when to move workloads back on-premises · Allow applications to auto-scale and clone into the cloud · Load balance across private and public clouds EDF Delivers the Hybrid Cloud <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5SdMPNKlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhXBET8XT%5FogbPefK1KcqNyyMRzsauq1SYQo9nfwhrJEVscQSxBUDOEb5cOnQS1PJsTayrV12HFbYUUujgKorEP5qaoap6T3XuZwUPRwAG%5FLnxwzdW1zn63IZA6z%5FlThhUI3GorR%2D3Y6Rvjye0Iox9u2N8nlDJl2690B%5FNx4kHZByXuwpvCd8V7Rue%2Dg9ug5akYRyxmiIgEbWzccE%2DyOKeNQHAo5RWkuGQBPDQ3EztvX8YNowiomVpdRtxfTiW5wTwK4Wsx76Zo2biqlzarS1rnPXPXpiaD%5FRaZJNgXwCbDi%2DY5xwDVPzH3%5Fb1RAHzyPObd%5Fhq3G9aL%5FQ%2C%2C/j01YeMLOLVlNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwMot1l1scencd1fmjNZeD90mcPucDgwfHplijQ9NCfSacYVSt%2DZICEK3Syiyk7XVfZQDdLB1kdNksqyg1GkTr8%2DLnFuBCkMBVXUjOwuWfYA0iza6YogWfii98FjCA9Ig2Xoq1Zcdk8CNTeGY0WGy20nc7g2LYEhp9cexrw6eLo97tsIqiXQ38XkTWsn37wDAh%2D8B7HUf]]> Joe, I know you get asked for time by thousands of vendors a week but do you have 30 minutes for my team and I to provide an introduction/educational overview to Turbonomic and see where we can align with you and the team at the DC Water? Best, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Tuesday, April 25, 2017 9:15 AM To: 'joe.edwards@dcwater.com' <joe.edwards@dcwater.com <[[mailto:joe.edwards@dcwater.com]]>> Subject: RE: $100 Amazon Gift Card for Turbonomic Introduction Hi Joe, Following up on the email below, I wanted to see if you might have some time this week to discuss Turbonomic. Usually our customers see a return on their investment in just 30 days because of our ability to automate actions that usually fall on the shoulders of admins and engineers as mentioned below. I’d like to see if we can provide the same value to you and the team at DC Water. EDF Delivers the Hybrid Cloud <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE1YeMDNLFxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhPAkK6WSn7v7LXZplGUbVj09N1%2Drrr228I7MiLlgGcT0oWVGNtOSupWO0mrBP%2DCcIvVDOz0ynsL4N7nh8ulb8j2pmbSpW5wiGZoWrywjmiAHAu3va2%5FnKbJYFHuIdUkWYS4HwRTPrb1x%5FM74gc%2Dh8x1PZOlEx22PZfc89P2gqLDHS65YLeW9JWb6C2wu7hha9wOy8fudQtdkTHK1bqG4uvVDdIo0qYkB0WYAJjKWlvBOMkkzejpEF5Vv8nYxKkm3sNlWxy%2D7hb04r%5FiH2dckG4Zyf6hiahyij1ObhQ5Ge7s%5F0o5iTlJDnW1fVidkm2U7CZ6g%2C%2C/j01Xd8LMLVlNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwMot1l1scencd1fmjNZeD90mcPucDgwfHplijQ9NCfSacYVSt%2DZICEK3Syiyk7XVfZQDdLB1kdNksqyg1GkTr8%2DLnFuBCkMBVXUjOwuWfYA0iza6YogWfii98FjAA48iih0yjupc%2DbmHK5fh92uY10XW6WOcY11r1oTJzGisX89crsQYlnQDwVEqSOezsBGCkZg%2C]]> Do you have 30 minutes this week or next to discuss further? Best, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Monday, April 17, 2017 9:37 AM To: 'joe.edwards@dcwater.com' <joe.edwards@dcwater.com <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5SdMPNKlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhXBET8XT%5FogbPefK1KcqNyyMRzsauq1SYQo9nfwhrJEVscQSxBUDOEb5cOnQS1PJsTayrV12HFbYUUujgKorEP5qaoap6T3XuZwUPRwAG%5FLnxwzdW1zn63IZA6z%5FlThhUI3GorR%2D3Y6Rvjye0Iox9u2N8nlDJl2690B%5FNx4kHZByXuwpvCd8V7Rue%2Dg9ug5akYRyxmiIgEbWzccE%2DyOKeNQHAo5RWkuGQBPDQ3EztvX8YNowiomVpdRtxfTiW5wTwK4Wsx76Zo2biqlzarS1rnPXPXpiaD%5FRaZJNgXwCbDi%2DY5xwDVPzH3%5Fb1RAHzyPObd%5Fhq3G9aL%5FQ%2C%2C/h0pSd8XHdlBQuVN5sfaWJ%2DfomyLBaJy7m7h%2DHvby191w2kdzLeHELH77h9gMTooHRMKkCyETJcVihV56SsqMOdJmyqdxIVOgdjblgpnfO5RaYLJZmZND3b609XUunOiRi3X5LmYPTERrIVW5LOwE]]>> Subject: $100 Amazon Gift Card for Turbonomic Introduction Joe – I noticed you and the team from DC Water made an investment in VMware’s hypervisor to allow you to scale out your business at a lower costs. I was hoping to discuss with you how our platform Turbonomic allows our customers to continue to scale and grow their business at a low cost, enabling teams to capitalize on the investment they made in virtualization. Turbonomic is different from the VSuite of tools and does what VMware’s VRops and VSphere <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5SdMPNKlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhXBET8XT%5FogbPefK1KcqNyyMRzsauq1SYQo9nfwhrJEVscQSxBUDOEb5cOnQS1PJsTayrV12HFbYUUujgKorEP5qaoap6T3XuZwUPRwAG%5FLnxwzdW1zn63IZA6z%5FlThhUI3GorR%2D3Y6Rvjye0Iox9u2N8nlDJl2690B%5FNx4kHZByXuwpvCd8V7Rue%2Dg9ug5akYRyxmiIgEbWzccE%2DyOKeNQHAo5RWkuGQBPDQ3EztvX8YNowiomVpdRtxfTiW5wTwK4Wsx76Zo2biqlzarS1rnPXPXpiaD%5FRaZJNgXwCbDi%2DY5xwDVPzH3%5Fb1RAHzyPObd%5Fhq3G9aL%5FQ%2C%2C/jUlWccbGLllNoVdlsbPWN7vhmzDGf5a7vvJtG%5Fjp1N8x0EZqPO%5FANQ752pxEDp5tcLSWFRYAAN0y4TNnDO2BaZJC9btKAlKmUTqxg67XUIBLdb1yz%5F5zqf%2DpiWsO%5FdTX1F3BGRQKHVV7SSC8bvkhiS28M80WDyTXwlHgGI8Glxcw1Zol8YiIUeSFvXKt5R%5FUsTKtGRx4zNCU012lO4pzkYU2r0sV%2DElrZfSu1RPI9I8vmwMTpv1toyN%5F0P80IcR4ux7UWzbZvb%5FtZeJ0R%2DCm3cD8t%5FICeE0Or9Y7eW31JA6bC62ySyx%2D5F6OjmIpaX1vKyABGrJ7wQO8h3kPYO0xcXifkTA58EJs5YZ28rCusCO5O07LOCHz8AStmyaMGaYjhHWfi4QluGzaOhfR6%2DBoDBe5O9f0lkSTRaaYuARmbKxjRIVADIbC5dSv1voxvSfsMxSN0OGXNFl%2DEYcVtf6Is9qLu82fhE79jkBcgmgGA3gowA%2C%2C]]> can’t to allow our customers to prevent problems from ever entering their environment. Typically teams run into three separate questions when continuing to virtualize within their infrastructure: · Are the virtual machines properly sized and placed within the infrastructure so we know the applications are getting the right resources they need in order to run optimally? · Do we have enough capacity within our existing infrastructure to onboard X numbers of virtual machines? · Are the virtual machines onboard and sized properly? And how will they affect every layer of the stack from storage to the applications? Turbonomic answers all these questions for you and your infrastructure team as well as help you plan for any workloads you are looking to onboard to Azure or AWS public cloud. This allows for our customers to increase operational efficiency as alerts decrease by 80% and increase infrastructure efficiency while still assuring application performance. Would you be interested in seeing how this is possible in a 30 minute introduction call? Right now we are also offering a $100 Amazon gift card for a 30 minute meeting. I am confident you will find it valuable. Best, James Wilcox Sales Representative – Southeast Turbonomic <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5SdMPNKlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhXBET8XT%5FogbPefK1KcqNyyMRzsauq1SYQo9nfwhrJEVscQSxBUDOEb5cOnQS1PJsTayrV12HFbYUUujgKorEP5qaoap6T3XuZwUPRwAG%5FLnxwzdW1zn63IZA6z%5FlThhUI3GorR%2D3Y6Rvjye0Iox9u2N8nlDJl2690B%5FNx4kHZByXuwpvCd8V7Rue%2Dg9ug5akYRyxmiIgEbWzccE%2DyOKeNQHAo5RWkuGQBPDQ3EztvX8YNowiomVpdRtxfTiW5wTwK4Wsx76Zo2biqlzarS1rnPXPXpiaD%5FRaZJNgXwCbDi%2DY5xwDVPzH3%5Fb1RAHzyPObd%5Fhq3G9aL%5FQ%2C%2C/j0pRdcbLLFlNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwt0x3V19ZqOQNUr7t8deF89gfdy%5FKjgaMJNXlQ8dSMLFVpkFqNNtWW2YSinRjbvYV4gaaKBi2uskrYqHznEov%5Fa0p0%5FVIHopaXBgUQHYOptl1xmkPJ80WhHK83XHJ4YwiDodhqkRxJfmfryn72A%2C]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5SdMPNKlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhXBET8XT%5FogbPefK1KcqNyyMRzsauq1SYQo9nfwhrJEVscQSxBUDOEb5cOnQS1PJsTayrV12HFbYUUujgKorEP5qaoap6T3XuZwUPRwAG%5FLnxwzdW1zn63IZA6z%5FlThhUI3GorR%2D3Y6Rvjye0Iox9u2N8nlDJl2690B%5FNx4kHZByXuwpvCd8V7Rue%2Dg9ug5akYRyxmiIgEbWzccE%2DyOKeNQHAo5RWkuGQBPDQ3EztvX8YNowiomVpdRtxfTiW5wTwK4Wsx76Zo2biqlzarS1rnPXPXpiaD%5FRaZJNgXwCbDi%2DY5xwDVPzH3%5Fb1RAHzyPObd%5Fhq3G9aL%5FQ%2C%2C/h09Rd8bJdlBQuVN5sfaYL6z%2D0SLJdpuno5xpHOXk3cEx1EF9PO%5FANR7ig8duCJ05OLuGNCM7KZpCwzoNGaXHXtBq47APLXHgdBHtko%5FXdY92dOBqyNBn1e33%2DkITu%5FCXuWr5GlYndVZFZQqobvpzoHi0FA%2C%2C]]>
